meta.author: Stefan Smieskol
meta.description:
File description: This file contains registers definition for accessing ORION data, that come with a setup derived from the related setup.
Related Setup: CFG_ATC_master setup file.xml
Compatibility: This mapping is compatible with ORION V6.51. and higher
History: revision: 0 date: 28.11.2016 author: Stefan Smiesko purpose: Mapping file for systems with setup derived from the related setup changes: initial version, ATC_ZA_ModbusSlave_Mapping_07.xml was taken as a base
